body_html: @trias702 : Yeah, a with tf.device("/gpu:0") mean "run everything under this on the GPU", at which point I expect it to fail with the error above (complaining that there is no GPU implementation of ResourceSparseApplyRMSProp. However, without that directive, it should be able to use the CPU kernel (as so your original report does sound like a bug)

body: @trias702 : Yeah, a `with tf.device("/gpu:0")` mean "run everything under this on the GPU", at which point I expect it to fail with the error above (complaining that there is no GPU implementation of `ResourceSparseApplyRMSProp`. However, without that directive, it should be able to use the CPU kernel (as so your original report does sound like a bug)
